verses.verse: And there was a man <WH376> of mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>, whose name <WH8034> was Mikhah <WH4321>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his mother <WH517>, The eleven hundred <WH505> <WH3967> shekels of silver <WH3701> that were taken <WH3947> <WH8795> from thee, about which thou cursedst <WH422> <WH8804>, and spakest <WH559> <WH8804> of also in mine ears <WH241>, behold, the silver <WH3701> is with me; I took <WH3947> <WH8804> it. And his mother <WH517> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be thou of the YY <WH3068>, my son <WH1121>.

And when he had restored <WH7725> <WH8686> the eleven hundred <WH505> <WH3967> shekels of silver <WH3701> to his mother <WH517>, his mother <WH517> said <WH559> <WH8799>, I had wholly <WH6942> <WH8687> dedicated <WH6942> <WH8689> the silver <WH3701> unto the YY <WH3068> from my hand <WH3027> for my son <WH1121>, to make <WH6213> <WH8800> a graven image <WH6459> and a molten image <WH4541>: now therefore I will restore <WH7725> <WH8686> it unto thee.

Yet he restored <WH7725> <WH8686> the money <WH3701> unto his mother <WH517>; and his mother <WH517> took <WH3947> <WH8799> two hundred <WH3967> shekels of silver <WH3701>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them to the founder <WH6884> <WH8802>, who made <WH6213> <WH8799> thereof a graven image <WH6459> and a molten image <WH4541>: and they were in the house <WH1004> of Mikhah <WH4321>.

And the man <WH376> Mikhah <WH4318> had an house <WH1004> of 'elohim <WH430>, and made <WH6213> <WH8799> an ephod <WH646>, and teraphim <WH8655>, and consecrated <WH4390> <WH8762> <WH3027> one <WH259> of his sons <WH1121>, who became his Kohen <WH3548>.
In those days <WH3117> there was no king <WH4428> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>, but every man <WH376> did <WH6213> <WH8799> that which was right <WH3477> in his own eyes <WH5869>.
And there was a young man <WH5288> out of Beit-Lechemjudah <WH1035> <WH3063> of the family <WH4940> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, who was a Levi <WH3881>, and he sojourned <WH1481> <WH8804> there.

And the man <WH376> departed <WH3212> <WH8799> out of the city <WH5892> from Beit-Lechemjudah <WH1035> <WH3063> to sojourn <WH1481> <WH8800> where he could find <WH4672> <WH8799> a place: and he came <WH935> <WH8799> to mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669> to the house <WH1004> of Mikhah <WH4318>, as he journeyed <WH6213> <WH8800> <WH1870>.

And Mikhah <WH4318> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Whence <WH370> comest <WH935> <WH8799> thou? And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, I am a Levi <WH3881> of Beit-Lechemjudah <WH1035> <WH3063>, and I go <WH1980> <WH8802> to sojourn <WH1481> <WH8800> where I may find <WH4672> <WH8799> a place.

And Mikhah <WH4318> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Dwell <WH3427> <WH8798> with me, and be unto me a father <WH1> and a Kohen <WH3548>, and I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> thee ten <WH6235> shekels of silver <WH3701> by the year <WH3117>, and a suit <WH6187> of apparel <WH899>, and thy victuals <WH4241>. So the Levi <WH3881> went in <WH3212> <WH8799>.
And the Levi <WH3881> was content <WH2974> <WH8686> to dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> with the man <WH376>; and the young man <WH5288> was unto him as one <WH259> of his sons <WH1121>.
And Mikhah <WH4318> consecrated <WH4390> <WH8762> <WH3027> the Levi <WH3881>; and the young man <WH5288> became his Kohen <WH3548>, and was in the house <WH1004> of Mikhah <WH4318>.
Then said <WH559> <WH8799> Mikhah <WH4318>, Now know <WH3045> <WH8804> I that the YY <WH3068> will do me good <WH3190> <WH8686>, seeing I have a Levi <WH3881> to my Kohen <WH3548>.
